title: The Yokai of Heavenly Spear – Part One
description: In Age of Mythology: Retold – Heavenly Spear, we wanted to bring the exciting world of Japanese mythology to life. In Japanese myth, yokai are supernatural beings of dubious nature that could be variously called demons, monsters, or spirits—although none of these terms fully capture the variety and uniqueness of these creatures. For the Heavenly … Continued

title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – Minor Update 153638
description: Welcome to a small update for Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition! This is the first of two small patches planned in the near future to address issues reported in the most recent update. Today’s patch addresses key stability issues on console. Our teams are already working on a second patch to address gameplay issues … Continued

title: Announcing Age of Empires IV on PlayStation 5 and New Expansion – Pre-Order Now!
description: At gamescom 2025, World’s Edge studio announced that Age of Empires IV will take to new horizons with its release on PlayStation 5 on November 4th, alongside a new expansion – Age of Empires IV: Dynasties of the East – launching on all platforms the same day. Pre-order Dynasties of the East now for 15% off … Continued

title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – Update 153015
description: Welcome to an exciting update for Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition! This patch addresses many pathfinding issues, also implementing a new “runaway/escape” feature, and improving the overall player experience. We are aware though, that the improvement will be an ongoing process and want to view this as the first of two major pathfinding patches. … Continued

title: Age of Mythology: Retold Minor Update 18.42553
description:
Welcome heroes to another exciting update, full of balance changes, minor fixes, and more! So take a peek at the notes and then jump in to the latest for Age of Mythology: Retold!

And if you didn't know already, Age of Mythology: Retold Premium Edition is available on PlayStation 5 right now!
